is there a disk tool for defragging?: as it happens, there exist e4defrag and xfs_fsr for ext4 and xfs, and btrfs supports rebalancing and defragmenting, depending on need

you can probably use e4defrag to report you the fragmentation degree of your files. I run a fairly full linux partition in one VM and thought that would be fragmented for sure. Gave me fragmentation score of 1 out of 100
